name: 1945 (XenonXYZ)
description: This game is a short little scrolling shooter that is part of one of the GameMaker tutorial levels. I took that, and spiced it up a bit with a couple of upgrades that make it cooler. Its still in development, and I'm going to be adding updates every week. If you like it, go ahead and donate a couple of cents. It will help me out on a future project that I'm working on that is going to be a million times beter than this. Its going to be a fully fledged game that will be out soon.
